pages.text: $(li)The Snowy Taiga is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/taiga)Taiga$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Overworld.$(br)$(li)This biome is composed mostly of Dirt but it is covered on top with a layer of snow.

$(li)In this place you can find some vegetation like Red and Brown Mushrooms, Dandelions, Violets, Spruce trees.$(br)$(li)Some animals like $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/grizzly_bear)Grizzly Bears$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Snowy Taiga$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
